title: Chrissy Teigen Addresses Her Trolling Past | Lin-Manuel Miranda & Christian Pulisic
itunes:title: Chrissy Teigen Addresses Her Trolling Past | Lin-Manuel Miranda & Christian Pulisic
description:
Chrissy Teigen apologizes for cyberbullying, soccer star Christian Pulisic talks about his championship wins, and Lin-Manuel Miranda discusses his book "In the Heights: Finding Home."

Donate at dailyshow.com/TrevorProject to support The Trevor Project in providing suicide prevention, crisis intervention and education, research and advocacy programs for LGBTQ youth.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
